original_text: And I know that his commandment is eternal life. What I say, therefore, I say as the Father has told me.”
korean_text: 나는 그의 명령이 영생인 줄 아노라 그러므로 내가 이르는 것은 내 아버지께서 내게 말씀하신 그대로니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And I know that his commandment is eternal life.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그의 계명이 영생인 줄 압니다.

sentences.original_text: What I say, therefore, I say
as the Father has told me.
